text.div:
This code system http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/split-method defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
automated Automoted matching algorithm or model identified an invalid match
manual Manual split performed by a human
none No split performed or identifed

name: SplitMethodCodeSystem
title: Split Method Codes
description: Codes indicating methods used to identify matched entities to split

concept.display: Automoted matching algorithm or model identified an invalid match
Manual split performed by a human
